int NumCoefsPCA
 Number of PCA coefs (used only when a combination PCA Gabor is used).

Detailed Description

Utilities for SVM management.

Provides some routines to make use of SVM

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CSVMUtils::CSVMUtils ( char *  BaseDir,
CPCA *  PCADataIn,
int  iCoefs,
int  ndir = -1,
CClassifiedDataset *  TBC = NULL,
bool  boTrain = false,
bool  boAuth = false 
) [inline]

Class constructor for PCA representation.

Constructor used to compute the classifier given the PCA projections of the classes to analyze

Parameters:
BaseDir Location of the classifier
PCADataIn PCA space used for representation
iCoefs Number of coefficients used to represent each sample
ndir Used for batch executions
TBC Training images
boTrain If set forces training
boAuth if set computes also n binary classifiers (recognition+verification)

CSVMUtils::CSVMUtils ( char *  BaseDir,
int  step,
int  nfilters = 16,
CClassifiedDataset *  TBC = NULL,
bool  boTrain = false,
bool  boAuth = false 
) [inline]

Class constructor for Gabor based representation using a grid.

Constructor used to compute the classifier given the PCA projections of the classes to analyze

Parameters:
BaseDir Location of the classifier
step Step used for the different Gabor filters. Grid step used
nfilters Number of filters to be used
TBC Training images
boTrain If set forces training
boAuth if set computes also n binary classifiers (recognition+verification)
